definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Be known as " cork is regnal " Portuguese the cork that already had hundred years is produced history.
sentences.chinese: 被譽爲“軟木王國”的葡萄牙已有百年的軟木生產史。

sentences.english: Be known as " cork is regnal " Portuguese the cork that already had hundred years is produced history.
sentences.chinese: 被譽爲“軟木王國”的葡萄牙已有百年的軟木生產史。

sentences.english: The cork popped out and the champagnegushed from the bottle.
sentences.chinese: 軟木塞啪地一聲蹦了出來，香檳就從瓶口噴出來了。

sentences.english: Cork and leather footbed for added comfort.
sentences.chinese: 軟木和皮革鞋底，增加舒適度。

sentences.english: Latex and cork blend footbed offers increased cushioning and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 乳膠和軟木混合鞋墊提供更多的緩衝和舒適。

sentences.english: Today, only a very small number of museums have examples of original chopines.
sentences.chinese: 如今，只有極少的博物館有最早的軟木高底鞋收藏。

sentences.english: One popular method has been to cork the bat.
sentences.chinese: 其中一種流行的作弊手段就是在球棒裏面填充軟木。

sentences.english: All it takes is a flying champagne cork or a shooting rubber band.
sentences.chinese: 飛起的香檳軟木塞或者彈起的橡皮筋都可能是禍首。

sentences.english: Reasons for quality problems of adhesive bond between cork sheets and composite cabin are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了引起復合材料艙體軟木粘貼質量問題的原因。

sentences.english: The other method is to pass the powder through 200 or fine mesh screen .
sentences.chinese: 另一種是把軟木粉用200目或更細的篩網進行篩選。

sentences.english: The unique cork foot bed of the Good Year Welt construction will mold to your foot as you wear them.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的軟木腳牀的好年頭沿條建設將模具穿著你的腳。

sentences.english: The lid is an aluminium-covered cork bung, over-covered with a tamper-evident shrink wrap.
sentences.chinese: 蓋子是鋁覆蓋軟木邦，過覆蓋篡改明顯收縮包裝。

sentences.english: I stopped it with a cork.
Cork bark and driftwood are attractive items to decorate with.
sentences.chinese: 軟木樹皮和沉木是很好的裝飾材料。

sentences.english: He has also coined his own word for almond — “cork nut.”
sentences.chinese: 這隻鸚鵡還能自己造詞，比如把杏仁拼成軟木堅果。

sentences.english: Cork is the ideal material for sealing wine bottles.
sentences.chinese: 軟木塞是密封葡萄酒的理想材料。

definition: cord fabric used in vehicle tires
